root: ^The park seems to be doing well,it even looks like the tree I planted all those years ago is very healthy. I hope things stay this way for awhile.

^Oh, you are the executive I saw on the news earlier, something about stepping down? I won't ask you to explain your reasons to someone you don't even know, however I do know your company does own a large portion of this park.
^I do hope you will continue to look after it well, a lot of history is here.
